Demonic Possession.name: Demonic Possession
Demonic Possession.flavor: You bind a demon to your enemyâ€™s soul and bend the creature to your will.
Demonic Possession.target: One enemy adjacent to your quasit companion
Demonic Possession.onHit: You slide the target up to a number of squares equal to its speed. The target then makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a creature you choose. The target has combat advantage for the attack and a +4 power bonus to the damage roll. If the attack misses, the attacker is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Demonic Hordes.name: Demonic Hordes
Demonic Hordes.flavor: You rip a hole in reality, letting loose a horde of minor demons that claw, rend, and trip your foes.
Demonic Hordes.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier damage, and the target falls prone.
Demonic Hordes.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. While the zone persists, you can take a standard action to cause each creature in the zone to take 5 + your Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier damage and fall prone. If the creature is already prone, it takes 5 extra damage.

Unnerving Gaze.name: Unnerving Gaze
Unnerving Gaze.flavor: You turn toward an enemy and fix it with a disturbing stare.
Unnerving Gaze.trigger: An enemy that can see you hits you while within 3 squares of you.
Unnerving Gaze.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Unnerving Gaze.effect: The target takes a -4 penalty to the attack roll and grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
